en.title:
Pengu
<size=30>and the</size>
Unlikely Encounters
en.credits_desc:
Written by: David Dionisio
Music from: Kevin Macleod
en.level_1_intro_2: Help Pengu out by determining the distance of the gap using fractions!
en.level_1_info_1: In order to add these two fractions, you must make the denominators equal.
en.level_1_info_2_a: One way to do this is by multiplying the denominators together to make them equal.
en.level_1_info_2_b: Then multiply the numerators by the same amount from the denominator.
en.level_1_info_2_c: After that, you can add both fractions properly.
en.level_1_info_3: Now itâ€™s your turn! Use the multiplier to make both denominators equal.
en.level_1_info_4: Notice how both fractions now have the same unit sizes? They can now be added properly.
en.level_1_info_5: Go ahead and type in the correct answer by pressing on either slot!
en.card_drag_instruct: Drag a card to an empty slot.
en.level_2_intro_1: Once again, an obstacle blocks Pengu's way. This time, an elephant seal!
en.level_2_intro_2: Hit the seal with enough fractions to move it out of the way!
en.level_3_intro_1: Watch out! A yeti is in the way!
en.level_3_intro_2: We must withstand the freezing wind to proceed!
en.level_3_info_1: In order to succeed, you must subtract the fractional attack until it reaches below zero.
en.level_5_intro_1: After an onerous battle, Pengu must catch a breath of fresh air.
en.level_5_intro_2: Help Pengu swim towards the land!
en.level_5_info_1_a: As you can see, there is a mixed number in this operation.
en.level_5_info_1_b: A mixed number is made up of a whole number, and a fraction.
en.level_5_info_2_a: To convert a mixed number to an improper fraction: multiply the whole number with the denominator of the fraction.
en.level_5_info_2_b: Afterwards, add the result to the numerator.
en.level_5_info_3_a: You can drag the whole number towards the fraction, or vice-versa, to convert.
en.level_5_info_3_b: Use this technique to help you out with tricky operations!
en.level_7_intro_1: A boulder is blocking Pengu's path!
en.level_7_intro_2: It is time to unleash the most potent of Pengu's fractional powers!
en.game_complete: Congratulations! You have uncovered the treasure!
